name: Onrefni Adventure: Chapter 2 - Happy Birthday
description:
Onrefni escapes from North Korea and is going to back to his home, Russia. Can he back at home at least at his birthday and get present from his lovely parents ?

Onrefni Adventure's continue and it become more dumber:

  • Travelling from South Africa to Russia
  • Collecting strange creatures
  • Domination of the countries
  • Multiplayer (coming soon)
